PageWidgetPortable.Title: Relatórios
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_R_GRUPORELATORIOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>( EXISTS ( SELECT HANDLE FROM R_RELATORIOS WHERE HANDLE = A.RELATORIO AND ACESSORESTRITO = 'N' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT RELATORIO FROM R_RELATORIOUSUARIOS WHERE RELATORIO = A.RELATORIO AND USUARIO = @USUARIO ) ) AND (A.GRUPO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t648_at450_hs4084175.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
